mapper.select: SELECT C.cart_item_id, C.member_num, C.item_id, C.cart_group_id, C.cart_quantity, C.item_size, I.item_name, I.item_category, I.item_image, D.dough_name_short, CASE C.item_size WHEN 'L' THEN P.pizza_price_l WHEN 'M' THEN P.pizza_price_m ELSE I.item_price END AS item_price FROM cart C LEFT JOIN item I ON C.item_id = I.item_id LEFT JOIN dough D ON C.item_id = D.item_id LEFT JOIN pizza P ON C.item_id = P.item_id WHERE C.member_num = #{member_num} AND I.item_category IN ('pizza', 'dough', 'topping') ORDER BY C.cart_group_id, C.cart_item_id

SELECT C.cart_item_id, C.member_num, C.item_id, C.cart_group_id, C.cart_quantity, I.item_name, I.item_category, I.item_image, I.item_price FROM cart C LEFT JOIN item I ON C.item_id = I.item_id WHERE C.member_num = #{member_num} AND I.item_category NOT IN ('pizza', 'dough', 'topping') ORDER BY C.cart_group_id, C.cart_item_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart VALUES( cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_num}, #{item_id}, #{cart_group_id}, #{cart_quantity}, #{item_size, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(cart_group_id) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE MAX(cart_group_id) END AS max_cart_group_id FROM cart WHERE member_num = #{member_num}
